title:
An approach to quasinormal modes of black hole based on reversed
  harmonic oscillator dynamics
abstract:
The frequencies of quasinormal modes (QNM) for the Schwartzschild black hole
are studied from the viewpoint of the particle scattering under an effective
Regge-Wheeler type of potential consisting of a parabolic type one in an
intermediate region and flat potentials on both sides. In particular, we use
the eigenstates for a reversed harmonic oscillator as the complete bases in
this intermediate region. Under this setting, the transmission and reflection
coefficients are studied in addition to the frequencies of QNMs.
